array.string: See driver shifts available in your location or another area of your choice
Check out the restaurant’s reviews, shift details including opportunities where transport is supplied
After you apply for a shift it moves to a ‘pending’ state in your applications list awaiting acceptance from the store
Once a shift has been allocated to you it will appear in your “My Shifts” list, awaiting for your shift to start.
Selecting a shift will show you all the important details and allow you to start the shift at the right time & place.
Tracking begins when you start your shift and stops when you end it.
Enter the the number of deliveries you completed and payment will be processed when approved
All completed shifts will be listed here with a status indicating if it has been approved, disputed or paid.
Stores can invite you to connect so that you can see shifts and runs that are exclusive to “their drivers”
A place to view all your connected stores. Once connected a store has the flexibility of paying you direct or via Yello
